name: 100sClub
description: What is 100sClub? It aims to bring together Turkey's companies that support youth employment with young talents. Companies are listed in the guidebook and mobile application. Special internships, job opportunities, career development and training opportunities are introduced to young talents. With a 360-degree service approach, participating employer brands have many opportunities to introduce themselves to young talents and interact with them. The guide, published annually, includes a limited number of companies from each sector, and only 100 companies are included in this exclusive club.
features: Visibility in business magazines through book promotion.
Participation in online events special for young talents
business_objectives: Hire Top Talent Faster and More Efficiently
Boost Hiring Manager Confidence and Productivity
Headline: Turkey's Companies Supporting Youth Employment
ShortDescription: 100sClub bring together the 100 companies that first come to mind when it comes to youth employment in Turkey, with young talents pursuing their careers!
enhanced_description: 100sClub is an exclusive HR platform launched in 2021, focused on connecting Turkey's leading companies committed to youth employment with young talents. Operating with a 360-degree service approach, it aims to help participating employer brands introduce themselves to young talents, streamline the hiring of top talent, and boost hiring manager confidence and productivity. The platform offers special internships, job opportunities, career development, and training opportunities to young talents. Member companies gain significant visibility through an annually published guidebook, a dedicated 100sClub mobile application, and promotion in business magazines. Additionally, participating companies can interact directly with young talents through exclusive online events, enhancing their innovative employer brand perception.
key_use_cases: Connecting companies with young talent for internships and job opportunities
Providing career development and training opportunities for young talents
Enhancing employer brand visibility and perception among young talents
Efficient talent acquisition for entry-level and youth-focused roles
competitive_advantages: Exclusivity: Limited to 100 leading companies in Turkey, creating a prestigious club.
Comprehensive 360-degree service approach for employer branding and talent engagement.
Unique visibility channels: Annual guidebook, mobile application, and business magazine promotion.
Direct interaction opportunities through special online events.
Niche focus on youth employment in Turkey, providing a targeted talent pool.
hr_functions_supported: Candidate Relationship Management (implied through interaction features)
roi_benefits: Faster and more efficient hiring of top youth talent.
Increased hiring manager confidence and productivity.
Enhanced employer brand recognition and positive perception among young talents.
Access to an exclusive and targeted pool of young talent.
